direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve the creation and manipulation of GroupBuilder objects, sharing similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods interact with the GroupBuilder object, with match using it to build a Group from a Matcher.
The build method in GroupBuilder is closely related to the functionality of getGroupBuilder, as it constructs a Group using the GroupBuilder.

enhanced_by.reason: The constructor initializes the GroupBuilder, which is essential for the getGroupBuilder method.
The match method uses the GroupBuilder to build a Group, which is a direct use case of the GroupBuilder returned by getGroupBuilder.
The build method in GroupBuilder can be used to verify the correctness of the GroupBuilder returned by getGroupBuilder.
